name: api_animation_Animation
description: The animation component is used to play back animations.

properties.name: animatePhysics
properties.description: When enabled, the physics system uses animated transforms from GameObjects with kinematic Rigidbody components to influence other GameObjects.

properties.name: cullingType
properties.description: Controls culling of this Animation component.

properties.name: isPlaying
properties.description: Is an animation currently being played?

properties.name: localBounds
properties.description: AABB of this Animation animation component in local space.

properties.name: playAutomatically
properties.description: Should the default animation clip (the Animation.clip property) automatically start playing on startup?

properties.name: updateMode
properties.description: Specifies the update mode of the Animation.

properties.name: wrapMode
properties.description: How should time beyond the playback range of the clip be treated?
